requests.title: Requests
requests.no current song playing message: There is no song currently selected. Click the play next button on any request below to get started.
requests.inactive event message: You must start your event to allow requests. Start your event by clicking the button below.

request confirm dialog message: Are you sure you want to reject this request? This action cannot be undone.
event confirm dialog message: Are you sure you want to end this event? All requests will be rejected. This action cannot be undone.

createEvent.eventToolTipUrl: This should be another webpage showing more info about this event
createEvent.name: Name
createEvent.venueWebsiteToolTip: This should be the venue website or a link to participate virtually in the digital realm.

manage events.not signed up message: Completed registration is required before creating an event. Navigate to Account > Profile to complete.

profile.not signed up message: You will not be able to create an event until registration is completed.
profile.tooltipMessage: This is the message that will be presented to the requesters after an ended event
profile.ariaLabel: A form field that displays a tooltip when focused or hovered over
profile.requiredFormFieldsMessage: Please enter the required fields to submit
